reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater comfortable, soft, and well-made, with a nice length for an average torso and a lightweight material that's neither too light nor heavy.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arach&Cloz Soft Knit Sweater: My Wife's New Favorite for Luxurious Softness and Style
items.body: I recently purchased the Arach&Cloz Women's Soft Knit Sweater for my wife, and she is absolutely delighted with it! This pullover top has quickly become a favorite in her fall wardrobe, achieving that perfect balance between comfort and elevated casual style. The most outstanding feature, and the one she absolutely raves about, is just how genuinely soft this knit is. It feels luxurious against the skin—not scratchy, heavy, or stiff at all. It has a beautiful, plush texture that makes it feel much more expensive than it is. It’s definitely the kind of sweater she truly looks forward to wearing. Beyond the incredible softness, the design is wonderfully versatile. The fit is flattering on her, offering a relaxed look without being shapeless, making it ideal for everything from casual weekends to slightly dressier office environments. The quality of the knit and the stitching also seem very durable, holding up well through a few washes already without pilling or losing its shape. If you are looking for a sweater that delivers on its promise of supreme comfort and softness while maintaining a chic, put-together look, this is an excellent choice. It’s a definite winner for fall and winter layering and earned a big thumbs up from my wife! Read more
items.author: Richard Fletcher

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Name brand quality, perfect for the office
items.body: The other reviews aren’t lying. I know clothes shopping on Amazon can be iffy but this sweater has the quality of name brand stores. It’s soooo soft and the color is beautiful. The fit is very flattering, no boxy or baggy at all. I’m 5’3, 148lbs with a DDD chest and the M fits like it was made for me. It’s a perfect lightweight sweater for working indoors in the winter. The only thing I noticed was I feel like the sleeves might have shortened just a tad after drying so if you have long arms you might want to size up or consider air drying or low heat (mine is set to medium heat). Read more
items.author: Sarahsmile

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater but sizing is inconsistent
items.body: I bought this sweater in 2 colors, both size small. For reference, I'm 5'2" and 120lbs. The dark red was at least a half inch longer in the sleeves and torso and just baggier overall. It fit more like a medium. The light green fit me great. The sweater is really soft and feels nice, it's lightweight which is great for Florida winters. I just wish the sizing was more consistent. I'll be returning the red and keeping the green. You win some, you lose some. Read more
items.author: Katie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent quality
items.body: I love this shirt. Fit is perfect. The material is soft. The shirt looks dressy can wear with anything. I ordered 4 more!! The only issue was the color is not bright like the picture it is a light soft muted green but still nice. Read more
items.author: Sherry

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Color, Quality Fabric
items.body: The color is beautiful and well represented online. It is comfortable, soft, and not at all itchy or irritating. The sweater is not thick, but is not cheaply thin. I have not seen any pilling so far. Read more
items.author: Amber M.

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater - runs small
items.body: I have purchased other sweaters from this company and loved them. This sweater is soft and a great color, but it does run small. Read more
items.author: Colleen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, warm, cozy and lightweight
items.body: The sweater is beautiful, lightweight, cozy and warm. It holds its form after being washed and dried in the dryer. Read more
items.author: World Traveler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So soft and flattering. Dress up or down.
items.body: Sooo soft and well made. You could size up for a looser fit or down for a true fit and it would be flattering either way. I wear a size large tee shirt and got an XL in this and it’s perfect. Loose where I like it (mid section) but not baggy anywhere else. I’m ordering more colors, I love this top so much Read more
items.author: Brittany Davidson

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.
about_this_item:

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Striped Army Green Black, A-dark Rose, A-gray Green, Striped Blue White, A-light Grey, Striped Apricot Black, Striped Black White, A-dark Red, A-deep Apricot, A-heather Coffee, Halloween02, Halloween01, Striped Taupe Black, A-dusty Rose. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
